attributes.action: amend planning laws to provide communities with rights to preserve their view of a place of worship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many communities gain pleasure and spiritual comfort from a view of their place of worship. Often unwanted development reduces this reasonable enjoyment, by building, change of use, or neglect to visual amenity. This petition would lead to the implementation of new policies for national and local authorities to explicitly consider places of worship as part of the visual amenity. Thus,  providing practical guidance and benefiting communities.
